attributes.action: We petition William Hague to vote for acceptance of the change in status of the palestinian territories to that of "non-member observer state"
attributes.additional_details:
Vote for Acceptance of the change in status as proposed.
There is no justification in using this as an opportunity to extract "concessions" from the Palestinians over their negotiating position, or bizarrely, attempting to deny them full recourse to International Law by becoming members of the International Criminal Court.
It is Mr Hague's job to represent the people of the UK at the UN, not to use his position to bully oppressed peoples at the behest of small interest groups.
